Reviews.Title: “sleep is 2nd priority”
Reviews.Author: JW52178
Reviews.Content: consider sleep key reason staying hotel unfortunately loud parties spill outside night lucrative sleeping guests called twice complain assurances modest results breakfast pleasantness staff facility average cooperation managment book parties loud music boisterous revelers expense overnight guests hotel worth considering

Reviews.Content: hotel 2 ago stay town business chose disappointed wont disappointed breakfast excellent happy hour food rumour super safe decide walk restaurants didnt experience definitely choose hotel am memphis

Reviews.Content: stayed april happy service quality changed 2 days row cleaned clean towels garbage emptied toilet paper soap shampoo disappointed reserved 2 2 king beds correct 2 queen beds

Reviews.Content: stayed night chance plus travelling dogs accept 2500 fee worth stay comfort pet hotel quiet front desk staff polite friendly professional noticeable stayed laquinta elsewhere 4 nights totally opposite experience
